pkgmetadata.longdescription: # lasfile Library for reading CWLS Log ASCII Standard v. 1.2, 2.0, and 3.0 .las files.## Installation```bashpip install lasfile```## Usage### Read LAS file```pythonimport lasfilelas = lasfile.LASFile(file_path='path/to/file.las')```### View sections in LAS file```pythonlas.sections```### View section data in LAS file#### Using dot notation##### As raw ascii text```pythonlas.well.raw_data```##### As pandas dataframe```pythonlas.well.df```#### Using dictionary notation##### As raw ascii text```pythonlas['well']['raw_data']```##### As pandas dataframe```pythonlas['well']['df']```## License[MIT](https://choosealicense.com/licenses/mit/)```
